summary: I do a playthrough of Skyrim all modded up. Also includes me as a follower in the files section
descriptionHtml:
[center][line][center][/center][img]https://scontent-a-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ash3/t1.0-9/10294373_10152402941704189_6137391144572516402_n.jpg[/img]
[line]
I start my adventure throughout Skyrim all modded up, I havent really done playthroughs etc and recorded it before so I may sound a little awkward or wierd at times haha but hopefully I get comfortable with it and make better videos as I go.

For anybody who wants to you can download my character as a follower in the files section and you can find him in riverwood.
